2085840.name: POPGOES Arcade Soundtrack
2085840.description:
The entire soundtrack for POPGOES Arcade, an official RPG spinoff of the Five Nights at Freddy's series!

Includes 21 songs from both game chapters (POPGOES: The Dead Forest & POPGOES and The Machinist) in MP3 format. 19 of the included tracks are composed by Kane Carter (me), with two ambient tracks contributed by Sian Mewburn (Turntail) and Damon Young (Radiarc).

Includes some spoilers, I suppose!
